gale:repo.gale:text: a Java-based authoring tool that allows the creation of .aha DM/AM models using a GUI

The concept editor is a Java-based authoring tool that allows the creation of [[models-example|.aha DM/AM models]] using a GUI. It was developed by a student, Koen Verheyen. The tool allows low level access to the adaptation rules, but is impractical to use when creating anything else than tiny adaptive applications. A high-level tool like the [[graph-author|Graph Author]] is recommended.
